level.text: Each Senator and Representative shall submit and file a Report of Receipts and Expenditures (R&E Report) for each Statehood Fund in accordance with § 3008 of Chapter 30 of this title.
Each Senator and Representative shall maintain their records in accordance with Chapter 34 of this title.
Within this title, each Senator and Representative shall be subject to the following provisions:
Limitations on contributions, pursuant to § 3011 of Chapter 30 of this title;
Limitations on constituent-service programs, pursuant to § 3014 of Chapter 30 of this title; and
Prohibition on use of government resources for campaign-related activities, pursuant to § 3301 of Chapter 33 of this title.
